threads.title: How do I use Qwen Code with a private git repository?
threads.author: user123

posts.author: user123
posts.content: I'm trying to use Qwen Code with a private git repository, but I'm having trouble authenticating. Can anyone help?

posts.author: dev456
posts.content: You need to make sure that your SSH key is properly configured.

threads.title: Showcase: A script to automate release notes generation
threads.author: coder_jane

posts.author: coder_jane
posts.content: I created a script that uses Qwen Code to automatically generate release notes from git commits. Check it out!
